section.title: Failover
section.para: The Diameter stack used by this RA supports application session failover. That is non generic(BaseSession) session state is replicated. This means that failover of application activities is transparent to SLEE applications. Also it implies that SLEE applications must adapt its state machines to recover generic session on node failure.

section.title: Load Balancing
section.para: As of now only available balancing mechanism is provided by Diameter stack. It depends on RFC3588 alogrith to select one peer from realm serving certain application.
